title: B5 due to leavers which i couldn't control
body: During my last ranked match things where going swimmingly with my Nami plays pardon the pun. After having lag in the early game my modem decided to crash. The game ended whilst i restarted my modem and i got a leavers due to this which placed me in bronze 5. During this game i did not die to the enemy once and my score at the end was 5,1,20 the one death being an execute. How is it fair that i get put into bronze 5 due to this after having a great game.

replies.body: I'm sorry but it isnt fair, but thats just how life is, there is no way to reset ur MMR after placing your placements. However, with a positive attitude, you can continue to climb up. Statistics say That if you spam q's, you will indefinitely climb up, albeit slowly but surely
have you tried climbing out of bronze its almost impossible xD
